sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./confessions.css"; export default class Confess extends Component { render() { return (

SCM UI Confessions

We collectively acknowledge the Grace of God and the gift of salvation.
We thank God for eternal life, peace, daily benefits and spiritual blessings in heavenly places (Psalm 68:19, Eph 1:3)
In SCM UI, we are built unto maturity; we keep the unity of the spirit in the bond of peace.
We walk in love
We are totally yielded to the spirit of God
Our affection is on Christ
Our life is built on the Word
The spirit of God is our teacher
The power of God is manifest in love and all fruits of the Spirit
The gifts and manifestation of the Spirit are ours

We see the marvelous works of God in our midst (Eph 4:3, john 1:26, 1 Cor 12:7)
We are in Christ Jesus
We no longer walk after the flesh
We now walk by the righteous nature of Christ
For the law of the spirit of life in Christ has made us free from the law of sin and death (rom 8:2)
The name of Jesus is our fortress and shield.
Because we fear the Lord, His angels encamp around us. (Pro 18:10; Ps 34:7; 2Cor 10:5)

We have the light of life; we walk by the Spirit; we do not fulfill the lust of the flesh.
We are led by the Spirit of God, we do not walk in confusion, and we always know what to do
We are the head and not the tail.
We know more than our teachers for the word of God is our meditation. (Deut 28:13, Psalm 119:99, 1 Cor 2:10)
The manifold wisdom of God is expressed in our academics. We are lifted in our academics; therefore, men are drawn to Christ.

We know and believe in supernatural health and healing
Christ bore our sickness and took away our infirmities.
By His stripes we are healed
Every cell and organ in our body is filled with the life of God.
God satisfies us, our families and senior friends with long life and prosperity (Isaiah 53:5)
The unsearchable riches of God belong to us
We have finances in abundance.
Our possessions are boundless.
Our reach and coverage are limitless.
Christ was made poor, so we are rich.

We have wisdom and power to acquire tremendous wealth.
(2 Cor 8:9)
The peace of God permeates our lives.
We turn the world around positively with creativity and witty inventions from God.
We improve our world with god inspired ideas and innovations
We take dominion over the entire world to the glory of Christ.
(Phil 4:7-8, Eph 1:21)


WE ARE THE LIGHT OF THE WORLD, WE CANNOT BE HIDDEN
WE ARE THE SALT OF THE EARTH.
WE ARE WORLD CHANGERS
AS CHRIST IS, SO ARE WE IN THIS WORLD.
(JOHN 5:13-14, 1 JOHN 4:17)

) } }
